condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative:
UNICEF has supported the elaboration of a KAP (Knowledge, Attitude, Practice) study on children's health, development, education and protection in Comoros. The KAP study is available and encompasses essential behavioral and social information and data to develop a national C4D strategy in coming months. A significant and strategic support has been given to raise awareness and to increase demand during the 2 nutrition campaigns, leading to a total coverage of 90-95% targeted children receiving Vitamin A, deworming tablets and being screened for malnutrition in the 3 islands of Comoros.
| Status:On-track | As-of Date:16/01/2020

title.narrative: Number of implementing partner staff trained on C4D
